name: ES 30-Min Bollinger-RSI Mean Reverter
description: Mean-reversion system for S&P 500 E-mini (ES) futures on 30-minute bars. Long entries: close below lower Bollinger Band(20,2) & RSI(14)<30. Short entries: close above upper BB & RSI>70. Exits when price touches BB midline (20-SMA) or RSI crosses 40/60, whichever first. Risk per trade capped at 1 % of equity; stop-loss 1.5×ATR(14), take-profit 2×ATR(14). Continuous futures series built with liquidity-based rollover.
